articles.title: TikToker reveals she has deadly lung disease after vaping for just one YEAR - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lucy Turchin, 35, from Oakland, California, was diagnosed with pneumonitis after she had been vaping for only one year. She now shares her story to spread awareness on the dangers of vaping.
articles.content:
Before her diagnosis, Ms Turchin worked as a personal trainer. However, her illness now makes it difficult just to walk long distances or get out of bed
